Fish

Fish是基于AngularJS，能快速按实现设计要求的前端脚本库

fsAside (fish.aside)

aside

<div class="bs-docs-section" ng-controller="AsideDemoCtrl">
    <div class="bs-example" append-source>

        <!-- Button to trigger a default aside with a scope as an object {title:'', content:'', etc.} -->
        <button type="button" class="btn btn-lg btn-primary" fs-aside="aside">Click to toggle aside
            <br/>
            <small>(using an object)</small>
        </button>

        <!-- You can use a custom html template with the `data-template` attr -->
        <button type="button" class="btn btn-lg btn-danger" data-template-url="aside.demo.tpl.html"
                data-placement="left" data-animation="fs-fade-left" fs-aside="aside" data-container="body">Custom aside
            <br/>
            <small>(using data-template)</small>
        </button>

    </div>
</div>
<script id="aside.demo.tpl.html" type="text/ng-template">
    <div class="aside" tabindex="-1" role="dialog">
        <div class="aside-dialog">
            <div class="aside-content">
                <div class="aside-header" ng-show="title">
                    <button type="button" class="close" ng-click="$hide()">&times;</button>
                    <h4 class="aside-title" ng-bind-html="title"></h4>
                </div>
                <div class="aside-body" ng-show="content">

                    <h4>Text in aside</h4>

                    <p ng-bind-html="content"></p>
                    <pre>2 + 3 = {{ 2 + 3 }}</pre>

                    <h4>Popover in aside</h4>

                    <p>This
                        <button type="button" class="btn btn-default popover-test" data-title="A Title"
                                data-content="And here's some amazing content. It's very engaging. right?" fs-popover>
                            button
                        </button>
                        should trigger a popover on click.
                    </p>

                    <h4>Tooltips in aside</h4>

                    <p><a href="#" class="tooltip-test" data-title="Tooltip" fs-tooltip>This link</a> and <a href="#"
                                                                                                             class="tooltip-test"
                                                                                                             data-title="Tooltip"
                                                                                                             fs-tooltip>that
                        link</a> should have tooltips on hover.</p>

                </div>
                <div class="aside-footer">
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-default" ng-click="$hide()">Close</button>
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" ng-click="$hide()">Save changes</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</script>
'use strict';

angular.module('fish.demo')

    .config(function($asideProvider) {
        angular.extend($asideProvider.defaults, {
            container: 'body',
            html: true
        });
    })

    .controller('AsideDemoCtrl', function($scope) {
        $scope.aside = {title: 'Title', content: 'Hello Aside<br />This is a multiline message!'};
    });

fsBusy (fish.busy)

from a 

调用次数：{{count}}

fsBusy 防止多次重复点击导致的多次重复提交

<div ng-controller="BusyDemoCtrl">
    <button fs-busy="fetch()" class="btn btn-default" busy-text="loading">text</button>
    <button fs-busy="fetch()" class="btn btn-default" busy-text="" busy-class="glyphicon glyphicon-refresh disabled">icon</button>
    <a fs-busy="fetch()" class="btn btn-default" busy-class="disabled" busy-text="请求发送中...">from a</a>
    <p><pre>调用次数：{{count}}</pre></p>
</div>
angular.module('fish.demo')
    .controller('BusyDemoCtrl', function ($scope,$q,$timeout,$log) {
        $scope.count =0;
        $scope.fetch = function() {
            $scope.count++;
            var defer = $q.defer();
            $timeout(function () {
                defer.resolve();
            },3000);
            return defer.promise;
        };
    });

fsCarousel (fish.carousel)

fsCarousel是旋转木马指令。

<style>
    .fsCarousel h3 {
        background: #fff;
        color: #3498db;
        font-size: 36px;
        line-height: 100px;
        margin: 10px;
        position: relative;
        text-align: center;
    }
</style>
<div class="fsCarousel" style="height:540px;margin:auto;padding:10px 30px;width:100%;background-color: #3498db;" ng-controller="CarouselDemoCtrl">
    <fs-carousel>
        <div ng-repeat="item in items">
            <h3 ng-bind="item"></h3>
        </div>
    </fs-carousel>
    <fs-carousel slides-to-show="3" slides-to-scroll="3" infinite="false">
        <div ng-repeat="item in items">
            <h3 ng-bind="item"></h3>
        </div>
    </fs-carousel>
    <fs-carousel vertical="true" vertical-swiping="true">
        <div ng-repeat="item in items">
            <h3 ng-bind="item"></h3>
        </div>
    </fs-carousel>
</div>
angular.module('fish.demo').controller('CarouselDemoCtrl', function ($scope) {
    $scope.items = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7];
    $scope.add = function () {
        $scope.items.push($scope.items.length + 1);
    }
});

fsCollapse (fish.collapse)

{{ panel.title }}

{{ panel.body }}
Add new panel

{{ panel.title }}

{{ panel.body }}

collapse

<div class="bs-docs-section" ng-controller="CollapseDemoCtrl">
    <div class="bs-example" style="padding-bottom: 24px;" append-source>
        <!-- ngModel is optional -->
        <div class="panel-group" ng-model="panels.activePanel" role="tablist" aria-multiselectable="true" fs-collapse data-animation="fs-collapse">
            <div class="panel panel-default" ng-repeat="panel in panels">
                <div class="panel-heading" role="tab">
                    <h4 class="panel-title">
                        <a fs-collapse-toggle>
                            {{ panel.title }}
                        </a>
                    </h4>
                </div>
                <div class="panel-collapse" role="tabpanel" fs-collapse-target>
                    <div class="panel-body">
                        {{ panel.body }}
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="bs-example" style="padding-bottom: 24px;" append-source>
        <!-- control a collapse panel with ngModel -->
        <div class="btn-group">
            <label class="btn btn-default" ng-repeat="panel in panels">
                <input type="radio" class="btn btn-default" ng-click="$parent.panels.activePanel=$index" value="{{ $index }}">Panel n°{{ $index + 1 }}
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="btn btn-default" ng-click="pushPanel()">Add new panel</div>
    </div>

    <div class="bs-example" style="padding-bottom: 24px;" append-source>
        <!-- ngModel is optional -->
        <div class="panel-group" ng-model="multiplePanels.activePanels" data-allow-multiple="true" role="tablist"
             aria-multiselectable="true" fs-collapse>
            <div class="panel panel-default" ng-repeat="panel in panels">
                <div class="panel-heading" role="tab">
                    <h4 class="panel-title">
                        <a fs-collapse-toggle>
                            {{ panel.title }}
                        </a>
                    </h4>
                </div>
                <div class="panel-collapse" role="tabpanel" fs-collapse-target>
                    <div class="panel-body">
                        {{ panel.body }}
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
'use strict';

angular.module('fish.demo')

    .controller('CollapseDemoCtrl', function($scope, $templateCache) {

        $scope.panels = [
            {title:'Collapsible Group Item #1', body: 'Anim pariatur cliche reprehenderit, enim eiusmod high life accusamus terry richardson ad squid. 3 wolf moon officia aute, non cupidatat skateboard dolor brunch.'},
            {title:'Collapsible Group Item #2', body: 'Food truck fixie locavore, accusamus mcsweeney\'s marfa nulla single-origin coffee squid. Exercitation +1 labore velit, blog sartorial PBR leggings next level wes anderson artisan four loko farm-to-table craft beer twee.'},
            {title:'Collapsible Group Item #3', body: 'Etsy mixtape wayfarers, ethical wes anderson tofu before they sold out mcsweeney\'s organic lomo retro fanny pack lo-fi farm-to-table readymade.'}
        ];

        $scope.panels.activePanel = 1;

        $scope.multiplePanels = {
            activePanels: [0,1]
        };

        $scope.pushPanel = function() {
            $scope.panels.push({title: 'Collapsible Group Item #4', body: 'Reprehenderit butcher retro keffiyeh dreamcatcher synth. Cosby sweater eu banh mi, qui irure terry richardson ex squid.'});
        };

    });

fsDatepicker (fish.datepicker) 

{{selectedDate}}
{{selectedDateAsNumber}}
to 

{{fromDate}} ~ {{untilDate}}

datepicker

<div class="bs-docs-section" ng-controller="DatepickerDemoCtrl">

<div class="bs-example" style="padding-bottom: 24px;" append-source>
    <form name="datepickerForm" class="form-horizontal" role="form">
        <!-- Basic example -->
        <div class="form-group" ng-class="{'has-error': datepickerForm.date.$invalid}">
            <label class="col-sm-4 control-label"><i class="glyphicon glyphicon-calendar"></i> Date <small>(as date)</small></label>
            <div class="col-sm-4">
                <input type="text" class="form-control" ng-model="selectedDate" name="date" fs-datepicker>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-4">
                <pre>{{selectedDate}}</pre>
            </div>
        </div>
        <!-- Custom example -->
        <div class="form-group" ng-class="{'has-error': datepickerForm.date2.$invalid}">
            <label class="col-sm-4 control-label"><i class="glyphicon glyphicon-calendar"></i> Date <small>(as number)</small></label>
            <div class="col-sm-4">
            <input type="text" class="form-control" ng-model="selectedDateAsNumber" data-date-format="yyyy-MM-dd" data-date-type="number" data-min-date="02/10/86" data-max-date="today" data-autoclose="1" name="date2" fs-datepicker>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-4">
                <pre>{{selectedDateAsNumber}}</pre>
            </div>
        </div>
        <hr>
        <!-- Date range example -->
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="col-sm-5 control-label"><i class="glyphicon glyphicon-calendar"></i> <i class="glyphicon glyphicon-resize-horizontal"></i> <i class="glyphicon glyphicon-calendar"></i> Date range <small>(dynamic)</small></label>
            <div class="col-sm-7 input-daterange input-group">
                <input type="text" class="form-control" ng-model="fromDate"  data-max-date="{{untilDate}}" placeholder="起始日期" fs-datepicker>
                <span class="input-group-addon">to</span>
                <input type="text" class="form-control" ng-model="untilDate"  data-min-date="{{fromDate}}" placeholder="结束日期" fs-datepicker>
            </div>
        </div>
        <p><pre>{{fromDate}} ~ {{untilDate}}</pre></p>
    </form>
</div>
</div>
'use strict';

angular.module('fish.demo')

    .config(function($datepickerProvider) {
        angular.extend($datepickerProvider.defaults, {
            dateFormat: 'yyyy-MM-dd',
            startWeek: 1
        });
    })

    .controller('DatepickerDemoCtrl', function($scope, $http) {

        $scope.selectedDate = new Date();
        $scope.selectedDateAsNumber = Date.UTC(1986, 1, 22);
        // $scope.fromDate = new Date();
        // $scope.untilDate = new Date();
        $scope.getType = function(key) {
            return Object.prototype.toString.call($scope[key]);
        };

        $scope.clearDates = function() {
            $scope.selectedDate = null;
        };

    });

fsDropdown (fish.dropdown)

dropdown

<div class="bs-docs-section" ng-controller="DropdownDemoCtrl">
    <!-- Button to trigger a default dropdown from an array ($scope.dropdown) [{text:'foo', href:'', click:''}, ...] -->
    <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" data-animation="fs-flip-x" fs-dropdown="dropdown"
            aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false">Click to toggle dropdown
        <br/>x
        <small>(using an object)</small>
    </button>
</div>
'use strict';

angular.module('fish.demo')

    .config(function ($dropdownProvider) {
        angular.extend($dropdownProvider.defaults, {
            html: true
        });
    })

    .controller('DropdownDemoCtrl', function ($scope, $http) {
        $scope.dropdown = [
            {text: '<i class="glyphicon glyphicon-download"></i>&nbsp;Another action', href: '#anotherAction'},
            {text: '<i class="glyphicon glyphicon-globe"></i>&nbsp;Display an alert', click: '$alert("Holy guacamole!")'},
            {text: '<i class="glyphicon glyphicon-link"></i>&nbsp;External link', href: '//www.baidu.com', target: '_self'},
            {divider: true},
            {text: 'Separated link', href: '#separatedLink'}
        ];

        $scope.$alert = function (title) {
            alert({
                title: title,
                content: 'Best check yo self, you\'re not looking too good.',
                placement: 'top',
                type: 'info',
                keyboard: true,
                show: true
            });
        };
    });

fsFileupload (fish.fileupload)

{{errorMsg}}

上传一张图片，最大1MB，最高1000px


{{f.name}} {{f.$error}} {{f.$errorParam}}

上传多张图片，最大1MB，最高1000px


  • {{f.name}} {{f.$error}} {{f.$errorParam}}
拖放多张图片或pdf文件到这里，或者单击这里上传
该浏览器不支持文件拖放

  • {{f.name}} {{f.$error}} {{f.$errorParam}}

fileupload

<style>
    .drop-box {
        background: #F8F8F8;
        border: 5px dashed #DDD;
        width: 100%;
        height: 150px;
        text-align: center;
        padding-top: 55px;
    }
    .dragover {
        border: 5px dashed blue;
    }
</style>
<div class="bs-docs-section" ng-controller="FileUploadDemoCtrl">
    {{errorMsg}}
    <h4>上传一张图片，最大1MB，最高1000px</h4>
    <button type="file" ng-model="f" fsf-select="uploadFiles([$file])"
            accept="image/*" fsf-max-height="1000" fsf-max-size="1MB">
       选择文件
    </button>
    <br>
    {{f.name}} {{f.$error}} {{f.$errorParam}}
      <div class="progress" ng-show="f.progress >= 0">
           <div class="progress-bar" role="progressbar" aria-valuenow="{{f.progress}}" aria-valuemin="0" aria-valuemax="100" style="width: {{f.progress}}%;" ng-bind="f.progress + '%'">
           </div>
      </div>
        <img class="img-rounded img-responsive" fsf-src="f">
    <hr/>
    <h4>上传多张图片，最大1MB，最高1000px</h4>
    <button type="file" ng-model="btnFiles" fsf-select="uploadFiles($files)" multiple
            accept="image/*" fsf-max-height="1000" fsf-max-size="1MB">
        选择文件</button>
    <br>
    <ul>
        <li ng-repeat="f in btnFiles">
            {{f.name}} {{f.$error}} {{f.$errorParam}}
            <div class="progress" ng-show="f.progress >= 0">
                <div class="progress-bar" role="progressbar" aria-valuenow="{{f.progress}}" aria-valuemin="0" aria-valuemax="100" style="width: {{f.progress}}%;" ng-bind="f.progress + '%'">
                </div>
            </div>
            <img class="img-rounded img-responsive" fsf-src="f">
        </li>
    </ul>
    <hr/>
    <div fsf-drop fsf-select ng-model="files" class="drop-box"
         fsf-drag-over-class="dragover" fsf-multiple="true" fsf-allow-dir="true"
         accept="image/*,application/pdf"
         fsf-pattern="'image/*,application/pdf'">拖放多张图片或pdf文件到这里，或者单击这里上传</div>
    <div fsf-no-file-drop>该浏览器不支持文件拖放</div>
    <br/>
    <ul>
        <li ng-repeat="f in files">
            {{f.name}} {{f.$error}} {{f.$errorParam}}
            <div class="progress" ng-show="f.progress >= 0">
                <div class="progress-bar" role="progressbar" aria-valuenow="{{f.progress}}" aria-valuemin="0" aria-valuemax="100" style="width: {{f.progress}}%;" ng-bind="f.progress + '%'">
                </div>
            </div>
            <img class="img-rounded img-responsive" fsf-src="f">
        </li>
    </ul>
</div>
'use strict';

angular.module('fish.demo')
    .controller('FileUploadDemoCtrl', function ($scope, Upload, $timeout) {
        $scope.$watch('files', function () {
            $scope.uploadFiles($scope.files);
        });
        $scope.uploadFiles = function (files) {
            angular.forEach(files, function (file) {
                if (!file.$error) {
                    file.upload = Upload.upload({
                        url: 'https://angular-file-upload-cors-srv.appspot.com/upload',
                        file: file
                    });
                    file.upload.then(function (response) {
                        $timeout(function () {
                            file.result = response.data;
                        });
                    }, function (response) {
                        if (response.status > 0)
                            $scope.errorMsg = response.status + ': ' + response.data;
                    });
                    file.upload.progress(function (evt) {
                        file.progress = Math.min(100, parseInt(100.0 * evt.loaded / evt.total));
                    });
                }
            });
            //if (files && files.length) {
            //    for (var i = 0; i < files.length; i++) {
            //        var file = files[i];
            //    }
            //}
        };
        /*$scope.uploadFiles = function (file) {
            $scope.f = file;
            if (file && !file.$error) {
                file.upload = Upload.upload({
                    url: 'https://angular-file-upload-cors-srv.appspot.com/upload',
                    file: file
                });

                file.upload.then(function (response) {
                    $timeout(function () {
                        file.result = response.data;
                    });
                }, function (response) {
                    if (response.status > 0)
                        $scope.errorMsg = response.status + ': ' + response.data;
                });

                file.upload.progress(function (evt) {
                    file.progress = Math.min(100, parseInt(100.0 *
                    evt.loaded / evt.total));
                });
            }
        }*/
    });

fsModal (fish.modal)

Examples

Modals are streamlined, but flexible, dialog prompts with the minimum required functionality and smart defaults.

$scope.modal = {{modal | json}};
弹窗动画：

modal

<div class="bs-docs-section" ng-controller="ModalDemoCtrl">
    <h2 id="modals-examples">Examples</h2>
    <p>Modals are streamlined, but flexible, dialog prompts with the minimum required functionality and smart defaults.</p>


    <pre class="bs-example-scope">$scope.modal = {{modal | json}};</pre>
    <div class="bs-example" style="padding-bottom: 24px;" append-source>

        <!-- Button to trigger a default modal with a scope as an object {title:'', content:'', etc.} -->
        <button type="button" class="btn btn-lg btn-primary" data-animation="fs-zoom" data-placement="center" fs-modal="modal">Click to toggle modal
            <br />
            <small>(using an object)</small>
        </button>

        <!-- You can use a custom html template with the `data-template` attr -->
        <button type="button" class="btn btn-lg btn-danger" data-animation="fs-bounce" data-template-url="modal.demo.tpl.html" fs-modal="modal">Custom Modal
            <br />
            <small>(using data-template)</small>
        </button>

        <!-- You can use a custom html template with the `data-template` attr -->
        <button type="button" class="btn btn-lg btn-danger" ng-click="showModal()">Modal
            <br />
            <small>(using service)</small>
        </button>
        <hr/>
        弹窗动画：<button type="button" class="btn btn-default" ng-model="animation"  fs-options="animation.name as animation.name for animation in animations" fs-select ng-change="showModal()">
        </button>

    </div>
</div>
<script type="text/ng-template" id="modal.demo.tpl.html">
    <div class="modal" tabindex="-1" role="dialog">
        <div class="modal-dialog">
            <div class="modal-content">
                <div class="modal-header" ng-show="title">
                    <button type="button" class="close" ng-click="$hide()">&times;</button>
                    <h4 class="modal-title" ng-bind-html="title"></h4>
                </div>
                <div class="modal-body" ng-show="content">

                    <h4>Text in a modal</h4>
                    <p ng-bind-html="content"></p>
                    <pre>2 + 3 = {{ 2 + 3 }}</pre>

                    <h4>Popover in a modal</h4>
                    <p>This <a href="#" role="button" class="btn btn-default popover-test" data-title="A Title" data-content="And here's some amazing content. It's very engaging. right?" bs-popover>button</a> should trigger a popover on click.</p>

                    <h4>Tooltips in a modal</h4>
                    <p><a href="#" class="tooltip-test" data-title="Tooltip" bs-tooltip>This link</a> and <a href="#" class="tooltip-test" data-title="Tooltip" bs-tooltip>that link</a> should have tooltips on hover.</p>

                </div>
                <div class="modal-footer">
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-default" ng-click="$hide()">Close</button>
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" ng-click="$hide()">Save changes</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</script>
<script type="text/ng-template" id="modal.tpl.content.demo.html">
    <div class="modal-inner-content">

        <h4>Text in a modal</h4>
        <p ng-bind-html="content"></p>
        <pre>2 + 3 = {{ 2 + 3 }}</pre>

        <h4>Popover in a modal</h4>
        <p>This <a href="#" role="button" class="btn btn-default popover-test" data-title="A Title" data-content="And here's some amazing content. It's very engaging. right?" bs-popover>button</a> should trigger a popover on click.</p>

        <h4>Tooltips in a modal</h4>
        <p><a href="#" class="tooltip-test" data-title="Tooltip" bs-tooltip>This link</a> and <a href="#" class="tooltip-test" data-title="Tooltip" bs-tooltip>that link</a> should have tooltips on hover.</p>

    </div>
    <div class="modal-footer" style="margin: 15px -20px -20px;">
        <button type="button" class="btn btn-default" ng-click="$hide()">Close</button>
        <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" ng-click="$hide()">Save changes</button>
    </div>
</script>
'use strict';

angular.module('fish.demo')
    .value("AnimationValues", [{
        "name": "fs-collapse"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-fade"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-fade-left"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-fade-right"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-fade-up"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-fade-down"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-fade-left-big"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-fade-right-big"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-fade-up-big"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-fade-down-big"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-bounce"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-bounce-left"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-bounce-right"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-bounce-up"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-bounce-down"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-flip-x"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-flip-y"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-light-speed"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-rotate"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-rotate-down-left"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-rotate-down-right"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-rotate-up-left"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-rotate-up-right"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-slide-up"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-slide-down"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-slide-left"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-slide-right"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-zoom"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-zoom-down"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-zoom-left"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-zoom-right"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-zoom-up"
    }, {
        "name": "fs-roll"
    }]
)
    .config(function ($modalProvider) {
        angular.extend($modalProvider.defaults, {
            html: true
        });
    })

    .controller('ModalDemoCtrl', function ($scope, $modal, AnimationValues) {
        $scope.animation = 'fs-fade';
        $scope.animations = AnimationValues;
        $scope.modal = {title: 'Title', content: 'Hello Modal<br />This is a multiline message!'};

        // Controller usage example
        //
        function MyModalController($scope) {
            $scope.title = 'Some Title';
            $scope.content = 'Hello Modal<br />This is a multiline message from a controller!';
        }

        MyModalController.$inject = ['$scope'];
        var myModal;
        $scope.showModal = function () {
            myModal = $modal({
                controller: MyModalController,
                templateUrl: 'modal.demo.tpl.html',
                show: false,
                animation: $scope.animation
            });
            myModal.$promise.then(myModal.show);
        };
        $scope.hideModal = function () {
            myModal.$promise.then(myModal.hide);
        };

    });

fsPagination (fish.pagination)

Default

The selected page no: {{currentPage}}

Pager

Limit the maximum visible buttons

Page: {{bigCurrentPage}} / {{numPages}}

A lightweight pagination directive that is focused on ... providing pagination & will take care of visualising a pagination bar and enable / disable buttons correctly!

Pagination Settings

Settings can be provided as attributes in the <pagination> or globally configured through the paginationConfig.

  • ng-change : ng-change can be used together with ng-model to call a function whenever the page changes.

  • ng-model : Current page number. First page is 1.

  • ng-disabled : Used to disable the pagination component

  • total-items : Total number of items in all pages.

  • items-per-page (Defaults: 10) : Maximum number of items per page. A value less than one indicates all items on one page.

  • max-size (Defaults: null) : Limit number for pagination size.

  • num-pages readonly (Defaults: angular.noop) : An optional expression assigned the total number of pages to display.

  • rotate (Defaults: true) : Whether to keep current page in the middle of the visible ones.

  • direction-links (Default: true) : Whether to display Previous / Next buttons.

  • previous-text (Default: 'Previous') : Text for Previous button.

  • next-text (Default: 'Next') : Text for Next button.

  • boundary-links (Default: false) : Whether to display First / Last buttons.

  • first-text (Default: 'First') : Text for First button.

  • last-text (Default: 'Last') : Text for Last button.

  • template-url _(Default: 'template/pagination/pagination.html') : Override the template for the component with a custom provided template

Pager Settings

Settings can be provided as attributes in the <pager> or globally configured through the pagerConfig.
For ng-model, total-items, items-per-page and num-pages see pagination settings. Other settings are:

  • align (Default: true) : Whether to align each link to the sides.

  • previous-text (Default: '« Previous') : Text for Previous button.

  • next-text (Default: 'Next »') : Text for Next button.

<div ng-controller="PaginationDemoCtrl">
    <h4>Default</h4>
    <fs-pagination total-items="totalItems" ng-model="currentPage" ng-change="pageChanged()"></fs-pagination>
    <fs-pagination boundary-links="true" total-items="totalItems" ng-model="currentPage" class="pagination-sm" previous-text="&lsaquo;" next-text="&rsaquo;" first-text="&laquo;" last-text="&raquo;"></fs-pagination>
    <fs-pagination direction-links="false" boundary-links="true" total-items="totalItems" ng-model="currentPage"></fs-pagination>
    <fs-pagination direction-links="false" total-items="totalItems" ng-model="currentPage" num-pages="smallnumPages"></fs-pagination>
    <pre>The selected page no: {{currentPage}}</pre>
    <button type="button" class="btn btn-info" ng-click="setPage(3)">Set current page to: 3</button>

    <hr />
    <h4>Pager</h4>
    <fs-pager total-items="totalItems" ng-model="currentPage"></fs-pager>

    <hr />
    <h4>Limit the maximum visible buttons</h4>
    <fs-pagination total-items="bigTotalItems" ng-model="bigCurrentPage" max-size="maxSize" class="pagination-sm" boundary-links="true"></fs-pagination>
    <fs-pagination total-items="bigTotalItems" ng-model="bigCurrentPage" max-size="maxSize" class="pagination-sm" boundary-links="true" rotate="false" num-pages="numPages"></fs-pagination>
    <pre>Page: {{bigCurrentPage}} / {{numPages}}</pre>
</div>

angular.module('fish.demo').controller('PaginationDemoCtrl', function ($scope, $log) {
  $scope.totalItems = 64;
  $scope.currentPage = 4;

  $scope.setPage = function (pageNo) {
    $scope.currentPage = pageNo;
  };

  $scope.pageChanged = function() {
    $log.log('Page changed to: ' + $scope.currentPage);
  };

  $scope.maxSize = 5;
  $scope.bigTotalItems = 175;
  $scope.bigCurrentPage = 1;
});

fsPopover (fish.popover)

popover

<div class="bs-docs-section" ng-controller="PopoverDemoCtrl">
    <div class="bs-example" style="padding-bottom: 24px;" append-source>
        <!-- Button to trigger a default popover with a scope as an object {title:'', content:'', etc.} -->
        <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" data-placement="bottom" data-animation="fs-flip-x" fs-popover="popover">
            Click to toggle popover
            <br />
            <small>(using an object)</small>
        </button>

        <!-- You can also use data-attrs to assign scope variables -->
        <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" title="{{popover.title}}" data-placement="top"  data-content="{{popover.content}}"  data-trigger="foucs" fs-popover>
            Click to toggle popover
            <br />
            <small>(using data-attrs)</small>
        </button>

        <!-- You can use a custom html template with the `data-template` attr -->
        <button type="button" class="btn btn-danger" title="{{popover.title}}" data-placement="left" data-content="{{popover.content}}" data-template-url="popover.demo.tpl.html" data-animation="fs-flip-x" data-auto-close="1" fs-popover>
            Custom Popover
            <br />
            <small>(using data-template)</small>
        </button>
        <hr/>
        <!-- A popover can also be triggered programmatically using the $popover service -->
        <button type="button" id="popover-as-service" class="btn btn-primary" title="{{popover.title}}" ng-click="togglePopover()">
            Click to toggle popover
            <br />
            <small>(using $popover service)</small>
        </button>
    </div>
</div>
<script id="popover.demo.tpl.html" type="text/ng-template">
    <div class="popover" tabindex="-1" ng-show="content">
        <div class="arrow"></div>
        <h3 class="popover-title" ng-bind-html="title" ng-show="title"></h3>
        <div class="popover-content">
            <form name="popoverForm">
                <p ng-bind-html="content" style="min-width:300px;"></p>
                <pre>2 + 3 = <span ng-cloak>{{ 2 + 3 }}</span></pre>
                <div class="form-group">
                    <div class="input-group">
                        <div class="input-group-addon">@</div>
                        <input class="form-control" type="email" placeholder="Enter email">
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="form-actions">
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-danger" ng-click="$hide()">Close</button>
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" ng-click="popover.saved=true;$hide()">Save changes</button>
                </div>
            </form>
        </div>
    </div>
</script>
<script id="popover-content.demo.tpl.html" type="text/ng-template">
    <form name="popoverForm">
        <p ng-bind-html="content" style="min-width:300px;"></p>
        <pre>2 + 3 = <span ng-cloak>{{ 2 + 3 }}</span></pre>
        <div class="form-group">
            <div class="input-group">
                <div class="input-group-addon">@</div>
                <input class="form-control" type="email" placeholder="Enter email">
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-actions">
            <button type="button" class="btn btn-danger" ng-click="$hide()">Close</button>
            <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" ng-click="popover.saved=true;$hide()">Save changes</button>
        </div>
    </form>
</script>
'use strict';

angular.module('fish.demo')

    .config(function ($popoverProvider) {
        angular.extend($popoverProvider.defaults, {
            html: true
        });
    })

    .controller('PopoverDemoCtrl', function ($scope, $popover) {

        $scope.popover = {title: 'Title', content: 'Hello Popover<br />This is a multiline message!'};

        var asAServiceOptions = {
            title: $scope.popover.title,
            content: $scope.popover.content,
            placement: 'right',
            trigger: 'manual'
        }

        var myPopover = $popover(angular.element(document.querySelector('#popover-as-service')), asAServiceOptions);
        $scope.togglePopover = function () {
            myPopover.$promise.then(myPopover.toggle);
        };
    });

fsTab (fish.tab)

在读课程内容
已修课程内容

用法

  1. 在指定的DOM元素上添加bs-tabs属性，并在子元素上添加bs-pane属性。
  2. 使用fs-active-pane属性指定当前被选中tab项的信息所保存的变量，可以通过修改变量信息，来改变当前选中的tab项。
  3. fs-tabs与fs-pane通过可通过属性修改配置。配置名称前加data-,例如data-animation="show-slowly"

fs-tabs

字段名称字段类型默认值描述
animationstringam-fade使用ngAnimate添加一个CSS动画效果
templatepathfalse如果提供了路径，将默认的模板
navClassstringnav-tabs使用在tab组件上的样式
activeClassstringactive使用在被激活的tab项上的样式

fs-pane

字段名称字段类型默认值描述
disabledstringfalse控制该tab项是否有效
namestring''tab项的名称
<div class="bs-docs-section" ng-controller="TabDemoCtrl">

    <button ng-click="tabs.activeTabasss='Last'">
        Select "Last" tab
    </button>
    <button ng-click="toggleThirdTab()">
        {{ tabs[2].disabled ? 'Enable' : 'Disable' }} 'About' tab
    </button>

    <div fs-active-pane="tabs.activeTabasss" fs-tabs data-nav-class="navClass" data-animation="fs-fade">
        <div ng-repeat="tab in tabs" title="{{ tab.title }}" name="{{ tab.title }}" disabled="{{ tab.disabled }}" ng-bind="tab.content" fs-pane>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div fs-tabs>
        <div title="在读课程 <i>(12)</i>" fs-pane>
            在读课程内容
        </div>
        <div title="已修课程" fs-pane>
            已修课程内容
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<style>
    .navClass{border-bottom: 1px solid blue;
    }
    .navClass > li > a{
        color:blue;margin-right: 2px;line-height: 1.42857143;border: 1px solid transparent;border-radius: 4px 4px 0 0;
    }
    .navClass > li{
        float:left;margin-bottom: -1px;
    }
    .navClass .active{
        display: block!important;
    }
    .navClass li.active > a{
        color: brown;cursor: default;background-color: #fff;border: 1px solid brown;border-bottom-color: transparent;
    }
</style>
'use strict';

angular.module('fish.demo')

    .controller('TabDemoCtrl', function($scope, $templateCache) {

        $scope.tabs = [
            {title:'Home', content: 'Raw denim you probably haven\'t heard of them jean shorts Austin. Nesciunt tofu stumptown aliqua, retro synth master cleanse. Mustache cliche tempor, williamsburg carles vegan helvetica.'},
            {title:'Profile', content: 'Food truck fixie locavore, accusamus mcsweeney\'s marfa nulla single-origin coffee squid. Exercitation +1 labore velit, blog sartorial PBR leggings next level wes anderson artisan four loko farm-to-table craft beer twee.'},
            {title:'About', content: 'Etsy mixtape wayfarers, ethical wes anderson tofu before they sold out mcsweeney\'s organic lomo retro fanny pack lo-fi farm-to-table readymade.', disabled: true},
            {title:'Last', content: 'last pane.'}
        ];
        $scope.tabs.activeTabasss = "Last";

        $scope.pushTab = function() {
            $scope.tabs.push({title: 'Contact', content: 'Reprehenderit butcher retro keffiyeh dreamcatcher synth. Cosby sweater eu banh mi, qui irure terry richardson ex squid.'});
        };

        $scope.toggleThirdTab = function() {
            $scope.tabs[2].disabled = !$scope.tabs[2].disabled;
        };
    });

fsTooltip (fish.tooltip)

Tight pants next level keffiyeh you probably haven't heard of them. Photo booth beard raw denim letterpress vegan messenger bag stumptown.

用法

对指定的DOM元素添加fs-tooltip属性来启用该指令。

也可以在程序中通过依赖$tooltip服务来启用该指令,但是它必须依托一个DOM元素才能有效。
var myTooltip = $tooltip(element ,{title: 'My Title'});

配置

配置参数可以通过指令上的data-属性传递，或者在$tooltip服务中传递hash对象进行配置。配置名称前加上data-，例如data-animation="".

字段名称字段类型默认值描述
animationstringam-fade使用ngAnimate添加一个CSS动画效果
placementstring'top'tab项的名称
triggerstring'hover focus'tab项的名称
titlestring''tab项的名称
htmlbooleanfalsetab项的名称
delaynumber | object0tab项的名称
containerstring | falsefalsetab项的名称
targetstring | DOMElement | falsefalsetab项的名称
templatepathfalsetab项的名称
contentTemplatepathfalsetab项的名称
prefixEventstring'tooltip'tab项的名称
idstring''tooltip的实例ID，用于事件句柄
viewportstring | object{ selector: 'body', padding: 0 }

帮助属性

方法

$show()Reveals the tooltip.
$hide()Hides the tooltip.
$toggle()Toggles the tooltip.
$setEnabled(isEnabled)Enables or disables the tooltip.

<div class="bs-docs-section" ng-controller="TooltipDemoCtrl">
    <!-- Markup for a default tooltip with a scope passed as an object {title:''} -->
    <p>Tight pants next level keffiyeh <a href="" data-animation="am-flip-x" fs-tooltip="tooltip">you probably</a> haven't heard of them. Photo booth beard raw denim letterpress vegan messenger bag stumptown.</p>

    <div class="input-group col-xs-5">
      <span class="input-group-btn">
        <!-- You can also use data-attrs to assign scope variables -->
        <button class="btn btn-primary" type="button" data-trigger="click" data-type="success" data-title="{{tooltip.title}}" fs-tooltip>Click me</button>
      </span>
        <input type="text" class="form-control" data-placement="right" data-type="info" data-container="body" placeholder="Focus to toggle tooltip" data-trigger="focus" fs-tooltip="tooltip">
    </div>
    <div class="checkbox">
        <label data-placement="bottom-left" data-type="info" data-animation="am-fade-and-scale" fs-tooltip="tooltip" fs-enabled="tooltip.checked">
            <input type="checkbox" ng-model="tooltip.checked" > Check me to enable my tooltip
        </label>
    </div>
</div>
'use strict';

angular.module('fish.demo')

    .config(function($tooltipProvider) {
        angular.extend($tooltipProvider.defaults, {
            html: true
        });
    })

    .controller('TooltipDemoCtrl', function($scope, $q, $sce, $tooltip) {

        $scope.tooltip = {title: 'Hello Tooltip<br />This is a multiline message!', checked: false};

        // Controller usage example
        /*
         var myTooltip = $tooltip(angular.element(document.querySelector('#test')), {title: 'Hello tooltip', placement: 'right'});
         $scope.showTooltip = function() {
         myTooltip.$promise.then(myTooltip.show);
         };
         $scope.hideTooltip = function() {
         myTooltip.$promise.then(myTooltip.hide);
         };
         */

    });

fsTypeahead (fish.typeahead)

typeahead

<div class="bs-docs-section" ng-controller="TypeaheadDemoCtrl">
    <div class="bs-example" style="padding-bottom: 24px;" append-source>
        <form class="form-inline" role="form">
            <div class="form-group">
                <label><i class="fa fa-globe"></i> State</label>
                <input type="text" class="form-control" ng-model="selectedState" fs-options="state for state in states" placeholder="Enter state" fs-typeahead>
            </div>
            <div class="form-group">
                <label>Icon</label>
                <input type="text" class="form-control" ng-model="selectedIcon" data-min-length="0" data-html="1" data-auto-select="true" data-animation="fs-flip-x" fs-options="icon as icon.label for icon in icons" placeholder="Enter icon" fs-typeahead>
            </div>
            <hr>
            <!-- Using an async data provider -->
            <div class="form-group">
                <label><i class="fa fa-home"></i> Address <small>(async via maps.googleapis.com)</small></label>
                <input type="text" class="form-control" ng-model="selectedAddress" data-animation="fs-flip-x" fs-options="address.formatted_address as address.formatted_address for address in getAddress($viewValue)" placeholder="Enter address" fs-typeahead>
            </div>
        </form>
    </div>
</div>

<script id="typeahead.demo.tpl.html" type="text/ng-template">
    <pre>{{pane.content}}</pre>
</script>

'use strict';

angular.module('fish.demo')

    .controller('TypeaheadDemoCtrl', function($scope, $templateCache, $http) {

        $scope.selectedState = '';
        $scope.states = ['Alabama', 'Alaska', 'Arizona', 'Arkansas', 'California', 'Colorado', 'Connecticut', 'Delaware', 'Florida', 'Georgia', 'Hawaii', 'Idaho', 'Illinois', 'Indiana', 'Iowa', 'Kansas', 'Kentucky', 'Louisiana', 'Maine', 'Maryland', 'Massachusetts', 'Michigan', 'Minnesota', 'Mississippi', 'Missouri', 'Montana', 'Nebraska', 'Nevada', 'New Hampshire', 'New Jersey', 'New Mexico', 'New York', 'North Dakota', 'North Carolina', 'Ohio', 'Oklahoma', 'Oregon', 'Pennsylvania', 'Rhode Island', 'South Carolina', 'South Dakota', 'Tennessee', 'Texas', 'Utah', 'Vermont', 'Virginia', 'Washington', 'West Virginia', 'Wisconsin', 'Wyoming'];

        $scope.selectedIcon = '';
        $scope.icons = [
            {value: 'Heart', label: '<i class="glyphicon glyphicon-heart"></i> Heart'},
            {value: 'Star', label: '<i class="glyphicon glyphicon-star"></i> Star'},
            {value: 'Home', label: '<i class="glyphicon glyphicon-home"></i> Home'},
            {value: 'Camera', label: '<i class="glyphicon glyphicon-camera"></i> Camera'}
        ];

        $scope.selectedAddress = '';
        $scope.getAddress = function(viewValue) {
            var params = {address: viewValue, sensor: false};
            return $http.get('http://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/geocode/json', {params: params})
                .then(function(res) {
                    return res.data.results;
                });
        };

    });

<form name="my_form" ng-controller="FormCtrl" ng-submit="submit()" novalidate>
<div class="row">
<div class="col-md-7">
<div class="form-group has-feedback"
     ng-class="{'has-error':my_form.username.$dirty && my_form.username.$invalid,'has-success':my_form.username.$dirty && my_form.username.$valid}">
    <label for="input_username">用户名:</label>
    <input class="form-control"
           type="text"
           name="username"
           id="input_username"
           ng-model="data.username"
           ng-model-options="{ updateOn: 'blur' }"
           ng-minlength="2"
           ng-maxlength="10"
           fs-realname-validation
           fake-remote-record-validator="fakeUsernames"
           required/>
        <span ng-if="my_form.username.$dirty && my_form.username.$valid"
              class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok form-control-feedback"></span>
        <span ng-if="my_form.username.$dirty && my_form.username.$invalid"
              class="glyphicon glyphicon-remove form-control-feedback"></span>

    <div class="error-messages" ng-if="interacted(my_form.username)" ng-messages="my_form.username.$error">
        <div ng-message="required">请输入用户名</div>
        <div ng-message="minlength || maxlength">用户名必须在2~10个字之间</div>
        <div ng-message="fsRealnameValidation">用户名必须是中英文字符</div>
        <div ng-message="record-loading">正在检查用户名...</div>
        <div ng-message="record-taken">对不起, {{ $parent.data.username }} 用户名已经注册</div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="form-group">
    <label>性别：</label>
    <label class="radio-inline">
        <input name="gender" type="radio" value="1" ng-model="data.gender" required="!my_form.gender"/> 男
    </label>
    <label class="radio-inline">
        <input name="gender" type="radio" value="0" ng-model="data.gender" required="!my_form.gender"/> 女
    </label>
    <div class="error-messages" ng-if="interacted(my_form.gender)" ng-messages="my_form.gender.$error">
        <div ng-message="required">请选择性别</div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="form-group">
    <label for="input_qq">QQ:</label>
    <input class="form-control"
           type="text"
           name="qq"
           id="input_qq"
           ng-model="data.qq"
           ng-model-options="{ updateOn: 'blur' }"
           ng-pattern="qqRegex"
           required/>

    <div class="error-messages" ng-if="interacted(my_form.qq)" ng-messages="my_form.qq.$error">
        <div ng-message="required">请输入QQ号</div>
        <div ng-message="pattern">请输入正确的QQ号</div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="form-group">
    <label for="input_mobile">手机号:</label>
    <input class="form-control"
           type="text"
           name="mobile"
           id="input_mobile"
           ng-model="data.mobile"
           ng-model-options="{ updateOn: 'blur' }"
           fs-mobile-validation
           required/>

    <div class="error-messages" ng-if="interacted(my_form.mobile)" ng-messages="my_form.mobile.$error">
        <div ng-message="required">请输入手机号</div>
        <div ng-message="fsMobileValidation">请输入正确的手机号</div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="form-group">
    <label for="input_idcard">身份证:</label>
    <input class="form-control"
           type="text"
           name="idcard"
           id="input_idcard"
           ng-model="data.idcard"
           ng-model-options="{ updateOn: 'blur' }"
           fs-idcard-validation
           required/>

    <div class="error-messages" ng-if="interacted(my_form.idcard)" ng-messages="my_form.idcard.$error">
        <div ng-message="required">请输入身份证</div>
        <div ng-message="fsIdcardValidation">请输入正确的身份证号</div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="form-group">
    <label for="input_email">邮箱:</label>
    <input class="form-control"
           type="email"
           name="email"
           id="input_email"
           ng-model="data.email"
           ng-model-options="{ updateOn: 'blur' }"
           fs-email-validation
           fake-remote-record-validator="fakeEmails"
           required/>

    <div class="error-messages" ng-if="interacted(my_form.email)" ng-messages="my_form.email.$error">
        <div ng-message="required">请输入邮箱</div>
        <div ng-message="fsEmailValidation">请输入正确的邮箱</div>
        <div ng-message="record-loading">正在检查邮箱是否唯一...</div>
        <div ng-message="record-taken">对不起， {{ $parent.data.email_address }} 邮箱已经注册了</div>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="form-group">
    <label for="input_password">密码:</label>
    <input class="form-control"
           type="password"
           name="password"
           id="input_password"
           ng-model="data.password"
           ng-model-options="{ updateOn: 'blur' }"
           ng-minlength="6"
           ng-maxlength="12"
           required/>

    <div class="error-messages" ng-if="interacted(my_form.password)" ng-messages="my_form.password.$error">
        <ng-messages-include src="password-messages"></ng-messages-include>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="form-group">
    <label for="input_password_confirm">确认密码:</label>
    <input class="form-control"
           type="password"
           name="password_confirm"
           id="input_password_confirm"
           ng-model="data.password_confirm"
           ng-model-options="{ updateOn: 'blur' }"
           ng-minlength="6"
           ng-maxlength="12"
           fs-match-validation="data.password"
           required/>

    <div class="error-messages" ng-if="interacted(my_form.password_confirm)"
         ng-messages="my_form.password_confirm.$error">
        <ng-messages-include src="password-messages"></ng-messages-include>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="form-group">
    <label for="input_birthday">出生日期:</label>
    <input class="form-control" type="text" name="birthday" id="input_birthday" ng-model="data.birthday" readonly
           required fs-datepicker data-autoclose="true" model-date-format="yyyy-MM-dd" data-trigger="click"/>

    <div class="error-messages" ng-if="interacted(my_form.birthday)" ng-messages="my_form.birthday.$error">
        <div ng-message="required">请输入出生日期</div>
        <div ng-message="date">请输入正确的出生日期</div>
    </div>
</div>

    <label for="input_native">籍贯:</label>
    <select class="form-control" name="native" id="input_native" ng-model="data.native"
            ng-options="native for native in natives" required>
    </select>

    <div class="error-messages" ng-if="interacted(my_form.native)" ng-messages="my_form.native.$error">
        <div ng-message="required">请选择籍贯</div>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="form-group">
    <label for="input_school">学校:</label>
    <select class="form-control"
            name="school"
            id="input_school"
            ng-model="data.school"
            fs-options="school.code as school.name for school in schools"
            placeholder="请选择学校"
            fs-select
            required>
    </select>

    <div class="error-messages" ng-if="interacted(my_form.school)" ng-messages="my_form.school.$error">
        <div ng-message="required">请选择学校</div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="form-group">
    <label class="checkbox-inline">
        <input type="checkbox" ng-true-value="1" ng-false-value="0" name="agree" ng-model="data.agree"
               required="data.agree === 1"> 同意协议
    </label>

    <div class="error-messages" ng-if="interacted(my_form.agree)" ng-messages="my_form.agree.$error">
        <div ng-message="required">请同意协议</div>
    </div>

<input class="form-control" type="submit"/>
</div>
<div class="col-md-5">
    <samp>表单数据：</samp>
    <pre>{{data | json}}</pre>
</div>
</div>
</form>

<script type="text/ng-template" id="password-messages">
    <div ng-message="required">请输入密码</div>
    <div ng-message="minlength || maxlength">密码必须是6~12位</div>
    <div ng-message="fsMatchValidation">密码不一致</div>
</script>
'use strict';
angular.module('fish.demo')
    .value('Schools',[{"name": "福建广播电视中等专业学校", "code": "fj"},
        {"name": "陕西广播电视大学成人教育学院", "code": "sx"},
        {"name": "陕西广播电视中等专业学校", "code": "sx"},
        {"name": "西安广播电视中等专业学校", "code": "xa"}])
    .controller('FormCtrl', function ($scope, Schools) {

        $scope.natives = [
            '中华人民共和国',
            '美国',
            '日本',
            '加拿大'
        ];
        $scope.schools = Schools;
        $scope.qqRegex = /^[1-9][0-9]{4,9}$/;
        $scope.fakeUsernames = ['angular', 'username', 'user', 'john', 'eric', 'noob', 'ng'];
        $scope.fakeEmails = [
            'email@email.com',
            'email@gmail.com',
            'email@website.com',
            'jon@gmail.com',
            'fake@gmail.com',
            'fake@email.com'
        ];
        $scope.submitted = false;
        $scope.submit = function () {
            console.log($scope.my_form);
            $scope.submitted = true;
        };
        $scope.interacted = function (field) {
            return $scope.submitted || field.$dirty;
        };
    })
    .factory('fakeQueryService', function ($timeout, $q) {
        var FAKE_TIMEOUT = 2000;
        return function (username, fakeInvalidData) {
            var defer = $q.defer();
            $timeout(function () {
                fakeInvalidData.indexOf(username) == -1
                    ? defer.resolve()
                    : defer.reject();
            }, FAKE_TIMEOUT);
            return defer.promise;
        }
    })
    .directive('fakeRemoteRecordValidator', ['$timeout', 'fakeQueryService', function ($timeout, fakeQueryService) {
        return {
            require: 'ngModel',
            link: function (scope, element, attrs, ngModel) {
                var seedData = scope.$eval(attrs.fakeRemoteRecordValidator);
                ngModel.$parsers.push(function (value) {
                    valid(false);
                    loading(true);
                    fakeQueryService(value, seedData).then(
                        function () {
                            valid(true);
                            loading(false);
                        },
                        function () {
                            valid(false);
                            loading(false);
                        }
                    );
                    return value;
                });

                function valid(bool) {
                    ngModel.$setValidity('record-taken', bool);
                }

                function loading(bool) {
                    ngModel.$setValidity('record-loading', !bool);
                }
            }
        }
    }])
    .directive('passwordCharactersValidator', function () {
        var PASSWORD_FORMATS = [
            /[^\w\s]+/, //special characters
            /[A-Z]+/, //uppercase letters
            /\w+/, //other letters
            /\d+/ //numbers
        ];

        return {
            require: 'ngModel',
            link: function (scope, element, attrs, ngModel) {
                ngModel.$parsers.push(function (value) {
                    var status = true;
                    angular.forEach(PASSWORD_FORMATS, function (regex) {
                        status = status && regex.test(value);
                    });
                    ngModel.$setValidity('password-characters', status);
                    return value;
                });
            }
        }
    });
